name: Sheikh Sakibul Hasan
specialty: Full Stack Development, RESTful APIs, MongoDB Optimization
bio: Sakibul is a passionate full-stack developer and educator with over 7 years of experience building modern web applications using the MERN stack. He focuses on practical, project-based learning and clean code practices.

name: Zayed Uddin
bio: Sadia is a creative UI/UX designer specializing in human-centered design. She helps learners master Figma, wireframing, and visual design for web and mobile applications.

name: Topu Bhowmick
bio: Rafiul is a backend engineer with deep knowledge of scalable system design and secure API development. He focuses on writing efficient, maintainable backend code using Node.js and TypeScript.

name: Md. Abu Sayeed
specialty: Brand Identity, Digital Illustration, Adobe Suite
bio: Tahmid is a professional graphic designer who teaches logo design, branding, and visual storytelling using Photoshop and Illustrator. His classes focus on creativity and market demand.

name: Nengminza Bapon
specialty: Network Security, Routing & Switching, CCNA Training
bio: Nusrat is an experienced network engineer who helps students master the fundamentals of networking, security configurations, and real-world troubleshooting techniques.

name: Ashraf Hossain
specialty: SEO, Social Media Marketing, Paid Campaigns
bio: Imran has trained hundreds of freelancers in digital marketing, helping them master SEO, Facebook Ads, and client management for freelancing success.
